title: "Supreme Court to hear Mohawk employee case; Firing, papers led to appeal"
body:
Jan. 27, 2009 (How Appealing delivered by Newstex) --  "Supreme Court to hear Mohawk employee case; 
Firing, papers led to appeal":            This article appears today in The Atlanta Journal-Constitution.   Newstex ID: 
HAP-0001-31296015
